short_summary: The procurement is open to all "bidders"
description: A requirement of 100 unit tire inflator assembly to be delivered to 25 CTFB St Jean sur Richelieu, Montreal >Sept 2023 <
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Tire Inflator Assembly**

**Reference Number:** W8485-2477777
**Tender Closing Date:** August 31, 2023, 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

**Procurement Overview:**

This is a competitive tendering process for the procurement of Tire Inflator Assemblies. The requirement is for the delivery of:

* 100 units of Tire Inflator Assemblies (part number M85352/1, NCAGE: 94894)
* To be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal by September 2023

**Tender Details:**

* The tender is open to all qualified suppliers.
* Suppliers are required to submit their bid electronically using the epost Connect service.
* Alternatively, bids may be submitted via other methods of bid delivery.
* Due to reduced business hours and limited staff available at the specified bid receiving unit, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically.
* The Department of National Defence retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement:**

The Department of National Defence is seeking the services of a supplier to provide Tire Inflator Assemblies. The procurement is in compliance with the contracting authority's procurement procedures and the solicitation document outlines all relevant details.

**Contracting Entity Information:**

* Name: DGAEPM
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
* Contact Person: Dany Lebel, dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca, (000) 000-0000

**Solicitation Documentation:**

The solicitation documentation is available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7746/w8485-2477777.a---bid-solicitation-%28en-canada-buys.pdf (English)

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7746/w8485-2477777.a---bid-solicitation-%28fr-achants-canada.pdf (French)

**Important Dates:**

* Publication Date: July 31, 2023
* Amendment Date: August 31, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 31, 2023,
